category.name: FMS
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_Volume_Failover_Volume_Name
preference.preference_description: Specifies the volume to use in failover situations during file import. Setting this preference with a volume name prompts the system to check the original target volume before import. If the target volume is filled beyond the capacity specified by the TC_Volume_Failover_Trigger preference, the imported file is directed to the failover volume specified by this preference. Valid Values: Accepts a single string as a value; the string must be a valid volume name.
